introduction: Acne affects people of all ages, but especially teenagers. For audio and transcript downloads, plus

vocabulary.definition: red, swollen, and sore, typically as a result of an infection or injury
vocabulary.example: The mosquito bite on my arm became inflamed and itchy.

vocabulary.definition: a group of people banded together or treated as a group
vocabulary.example: The new employees formed a cohort and attended orientation together.

vocabulary.definition: to make something seem less important or serious than it really is
vocabulary.example: It is important not to trivialize someone's feelings, even if you do not understand them.

vocabulary.definition: feeling undue awareness of oneself, especially as it pertains to appearance, behavior, or abilities
vocabulary.example: She felt self-conscious about her accent when speaking in front of a large audience.

vocabulary.definition: a cause of great distress or annoyance
vocabulary.example: Her constant lateness was the bane of his existence.

vocabulary.definition: an instruction written by a medical practitioner that authorizes a patient to be provided a medicine or treatment
vocabulary.example: The doctor gave her a prescription for antibiotics to treat the infection.
